data.title: Bitcoin Hits Two-Week High In Cautious Crypto Market Recovery
data.description: The original cryptocurrency rose as much as 2.6% to about $93,965, its highest intraday level since Nov. 17.  The digital assets market remains on shaky ground after a bruising selloff that began in early October, just days after Bitcoin hit a record of over $126,000.  “Bitcoin fans will be rightly cautious about this rally in the cryptocurrency, having seen so many false dawns in recent months, but it looks like the recovery in stock market risk appetite is finally leaching across into the crypto space,” Chris Beauchamp, UK chief market analyst at investment and trading platform IG, said in a note.
data.keywords: Bloomberg, investing in Bitcoin, digital assets
